Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: cozmoem
Reviews.Content: Awesum phone for any manly man! OK if u drop it or throw it around! Its a tuff phone for the rugged guys out there!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I love the phone, however I can only use the voice and basic text (no pictures text, no internet). I was told I could use this phone with Straight Talk and all the functions but this is not true. I even carried the phone to a cell phone repair shop and they could not get it to work either. My first disappointment with anything I have order off of Amazon. I would give the phone 5 stars if it worked with Straight Talk.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, but has some issues.
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Battery cover worn tabs, pops open and battery comes out and occasionally just shuts off.  I left it set without battery in it for a week, and then charged it up and now it works o.k.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jellybean
Reviews.Content: I know it is a flip phone but for me it is what I enjoy over a smart phone. This phone is easy to use. And rugged

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Unica Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Exactly what my husband wanted! Was in great condition and had all the product info. He is still using it now.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone.
Reviews.Author: texyak
Reviews.Content: I've had several iPhones and a Samsung S4.  Tired of spending hundreds of $ each month on data plans so I went caveman.  Phone is extremely durable and of top tier quality.  I used to freak out if my 2yo got a hold of my smart phone.  This phone is so tough I could care less now if he drops or throws it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone..
Reviews.Author: Mainiac "Mountain Dreamer"
Reviews.Content: Old school cell phone guy, my other one was somewhat challenging to use. This one looks brand new. Switched the SIM card and everything worked extremely well. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Richard Marler
Reviews.Content: Satisfied customerphone is easy to operate,  good sound, does what i need out of  basic cell phone. would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: I love the Rubgy phone
Reviews.Author: ellen smith
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect for me .  Nothing fancy just practical rugged and easy to use. If I drop it it still works and didn't break My last phone broke the first time i dropped it

Reviews.Title: Ok purchase
Reviews.Author: BQ
Reviews.Content: Was pleased with phone but had to go to Walmart and purchase a charger, the one that came with my cell phone was defective and would not charge the phone.

Reviews.Title: Good outdoors phone
Reviews.Author: southern heritage
Reviews.Content: Not a smart phone by any means, but handles outside well, receive signal well. Just a good no frills phone for someone who works in the field.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: sonya brooks
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping. My husband broke his phone and needed one very quickly. This was a great choice. Great shape for used phone. Better than his was before the run over.  I rarely give 5 star, really no reason not to. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: For used it is okay.
Reviews.Author: J Torres
Reviews.Content: Next tine I am buying new.  Everything works okay but the volume. I can barely hear anyone I am talking too. Finally cleaned the speaker out and it is a little better. Buying new next time.

Reviews.Title: Most durable phone ever
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Eisentrout
Reviews.Content: 100% worth the price.  My dad beats the everliving crap out of his, he is on his second phone in this model/style but the only reason the old one was replaced wasn't because he beat it up too bad - it was because the phone eventually started malfunctioning as far as the operating system goes. But physically the phone was fine which shocked me.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: dsn
Reviews.Content: nice phone good quality only issue was the phone hadnt been cleared out from the preivious owner so i got all of thier contact messages, and photos (some of a personal nature) lol but over all a good product

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: Al Davis
Reviews.Content: Al DavisThis phone is not what I thought it was. sound is bad, know book. If I new all that I would have not brought this phone. Just to many things are wrong with this phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
MicroSD Memory card expansion slot - verified up to 16 GB
simcard and start making calls.
Up to 250 Hours Standby Time, Up to 3 Hours Talk Time
Bluetooth Stereo
ProductInfo.Name: AT&T Samsung SGH-A847 Rubgy 2 Rugged GSM 3G MP3 Cell Phone No Contract
